certificationmodel.text.help:
The structure of the certification text is written in JSON language. It is represented by an array of objects and, therefore, must start with [ and end with ]. The array can contain the following objects:

  • text: shows a fixed text.
    {"type": "text", "value": "Text to be shown"}
  • variable: shows the value of a submission value or a user value referred to the certification. If the certification type is user and a submission value and a certification value is tried to be retrieved, this will return an empty text. Parameters for "user": admin, locked_form, name, address, city, state, country, postalcode, birthday, gender, phone1, phone2, instituition, customtext1, customtext2, customtext3, customtext4, customtext5, customflag1, customflag2, customflag3, customflag4, customflag5, note. Parameters for "submission-content": the number indicating the position. If it is a grouped text, the dimensions are separated by -.
    {"type": "variable", "entity": "user", "parameter" : "name"}
    {"type": "variable", "entity": "submission-content", "parameter" : "1"}
    {"type": "variable", "entity": "submission-content", "parameter" : "2-1"}
  • list: shows a list of the previously mentioned objects, separated by a comma (if more than two) and by an "and" before the last one. Only non empty objects are considered.
    {"type": "list", "content": [{"type": "variable", "entity": "submission-content", "parameter" : "1"},{"type": "variable", "entity":"submission-content", "parameter" : "2"}]}

General attributes

  • uppercase: outputs the text of an object in uppercase.
    {"type": "variable", "entity": "user", "parameter" : "name", "uppercase" : "true"}
